title.narrative: Cooperative Development through Policy Changes on Gender Equality

description.narrative: NCCSL, the implementing partner of the project, previously with the support of We Effect improved and strengthen the cooperatives and staff while promoting good governance in the cooperative sector. Under this project, NCCSL being an apex organisation leads a process of development of a gender policy and integration of good governance into the legal structures. The project will also facilitate to improve the organisational capacities of ten selected District Cooperative Councils as well as six selected cooperative federations. It is expected to have long-term results as favourable policy changes to promote women leadership at BOD level having equal opportunities in decision-making process, establish and promote good governance at provincial and national level in cooperation with the policies and sustainable cooperative business development.

The National Cooperative Council of Sri Lanka (NCCSL), an apex level cooperative in the county aims to enable the environment for the cooperative development through the policy changes on promotion of gender equality and good governance. Under the project there has been selected six district cooperative councils (DCC), covering Central, North Central, Eastern and Southern provinces in Sri Lanka. The project did the orientations for the each DCC and apex organisations in order to have a better understanding of the project and also to draw its road map, with the milestones. The strategic plans for the six DCC were completed as well. For the first time in history of the cooperative sector, the project took the initiative to form the national level gender committee for the cooperative sector with the participation and collaboration of the Department of Cooperative Development. Furthermore, a needs analysis for NCCSL for the next five years was done. The working committee of national level gender committee is in the process of developing gender policy document for the cooperatives and since the cooperative sector lack gender trainers, a TOT programme on gender equality promotion was carried out.

participating-org.narrative: Participatory Action and Learning Methodologies Foundation
